subject: Axial bearing dimensions – pedal customization question
description_text:
Hello SIMSONN team,

I am currently customizing and fine-tuning one of your pedal assemblies and
during disassembly I realized that I am missing *one axial thrust washer*
from the pedal mechanism.

The assembly uses an *axial (thrust) bearing with two thrust washers*, both
washers having a locating groove (no flat washer involved).

I would like to ask if you could please confirm the *exact dimensions* of
the thrust washer used in this assembly (inner diameter, outer diameter,
and thickness), or alternatively the *part number* if it can be ordered as
a spare part.

I have attached photos for reference:
• one photo of the original thrust washer
• one photo of the complete thrust bearing assembly
• one photo showing the side where the washer is missing

This will help me ensure I use the correct replacement part.

Thank you very much for your support.

Kind regards,

conversations.body_text: Hi Dobre Alexandru Ionut,  Please provide a shipping address so we can send you a replacement bearing. Also, kindly share your order number, contact name, phone number, and full shipping address.

I would like to sincerely thank you for your incredibly fast, kind, and
professional support.

I truly appreciate your willingness to help and even offer to send a
replacement part — that level of customer care really means a lot to me and
says a lot about Simsonn as a company.I wanted to let you know that,
fortunately, I managed to find the missing part under my rig. It appears
that it had jumped away during assembly. After finding it, I was able to
reassemble the entire mechanism correctly, and everything is now installed
and functioning perfectly.

Thank you once again for your patience, support, and dedication to your
customers. It genuinely gave me a lot of confidence in both the product and
the brand.

Wishing you all the best, and thanks again for the outstanding service!

On Sun, Dec 14, 2025 at 3:18 AM service@simsonn.com

Hi Dobre Alexandru Ionut,  We’re glad to hear that your issue has been resolved. If you encounter any problems during future use, please feel free to contact us at any time — we’ll be happy to assist you.
